articles.title: NASA wants you to help gather Sun data during total solar eclipse - Fox Weather
articles.description: If you have always wanted to be a NASA scientist, here is your chance. NASA is involved in several scientific research projects that need your help if you are along the path of totality during the America's Total Eclipse on April 8th.

articles.title: US tourist on safari in Zambia killed by charging elephant - CNN
articles.description: An elderly American woman was killed in Zambia after an elephant charged at a vehicle carrying tourists in Kafue National Park.

articles.title: April 8 total solar eclipse: Everything you need to know - Livescience.com
articles.description: On April 8, a total solar eclipse will be visible to millions of people in North America. Here's everything you need to know about where, when, and how to view the 2024 solar eclipse.
articles.content:
On Monday, April 8, a total solar eclipse
 will plunge parts of 15 U.S. states into sudden darkness as the moon's enormous shadow sweeps across the continent.
